io.fluo.api.types

Class StringEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fluo.api.types.StringEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encoder

    public class StringEncoder
extends Object
implements Encoder
    Transforms Java primitives to and from bytes using a String encoding
